text: Jennifer Beals was born December 19, 1963 around the Chicago metropolitan area. Her most notable acting role was playing Alexandra Owens for the 1983 film Flashdance. She also starred in the Showtime television program The L Word. She's been in more than 50 movies over the years. Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Jennifer Beals
